summary: This is a great new house near The whiterun watchtower that is aimed at warrior type characters.
descriptionHtml:
About me:

I have just recently started modding so any feedback will be really appreciated.

About the Warrior’s Longhouse:

The Warrior’s Longhouse is a great free player home that is near the western watchtower near whiterun. It has everything that you may need. From a alchemy bench to a bed. It is designed after a longhouse in an orc stronghold therefore it is perfect for warriors, but it is also great for a place to stay.

What’s new:

I have changed the location to near the western watch tower (look on map). I will upload pictures as soon as possible. I have added stables with 2 horses in and also I have made a nice shack for the crafting equipment to go in. Since the shack is outside all the time it has some grass growing inside it for some realism.


Suggestions: 

Please leave any suggestions for ways I can improve the mod and I will try and get it finished as soon as possible.

Steam: 

Also on the workshop http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=68071281
author: TheN00bKilla

files.name: The Warriors Longhouse v 2
files.changelogHtml:
Changed location to near the Whiterun Watchtower (look on map)
Added new weapons in bedroom - The weightless skyforge steel sword and greatsword. (they both weigh nothing and have double speed than normal)
Added a nice little shack for the outdoor crafting area to go
